definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Water splashed near his shoe-tops as he moved forward.
sentences.chinese: 他向前走的时候，水花在他的鞋尖附近飞溅着。

sentences.english: Qishui waves rolling in, spray wet the car curtain .
sentences.chinese: 淇水波涛滚滚，水花打湿了车上的布幔。

sentences.english: Or is it the plashing of tears?
sentences.chinese: 或者那是眼泪溅起的水花么？

sentences.english: He jumped into the pool, making a loud splash.
The water droplets are being sent into the air by the vibration of a male alligator's sub-sonic call.
sentences.chinese: 一只雄短吻鳄鱼哼叫时发出的亚音波激起片片水花。

sentences.english: Sunlit waterfall spray tumbles into our boat and a chorus of various insects rings in our ears.
sentences.chinese: 阳光下的瀑布水花洒落进小船，虫鸣声不绝于耳。

sentences.english: A smother of spray dashed up, wetting his face.
sentences.chinese: 一阵水花扑来，溅湿了他的脸。

sentences.english: They do not think whom they souse with spray.
sentences.chinese: 他们不曾想过他们激起的水花溅湿了谁。

sentences.english: I fell into the water with a splash.
sentences.chinese: 我跌入水中，激起水花四溅。

sentences.english: Hailstones bounce against the grass and splash into the puddles.
sentences.chinese: 顷刻间草地上银珠乱蹦，水洼里水花四溅。

sentences.english: Use a taller tank to help prevent splashes from hitting your camera.
sentences.chinese: 使用一个比较高的容器，以免水花溅到你的相机上。

sentences.english: Water and falling fruit are fast.
sentences.chinese: 水花四溅和自由落体的水果是很快速的。

sentences.english: The Goat also jumps into the well and makes a big splash.
sentences.chinese: 羊也跳入井口并溅起了大水花。

sentences.english: The killer flung the calf around until it fainted. Water splashed all around.
sentences.chinese: 虎鲸猛烈甩动着嘴里的小海豹，溅起漫天水花。

sentences.english: Leaves shudder under their weight before rebounding, and the sidewalk wears a coat of shiny spots.
sentences.chinese: 人行道铺上了一层亮闪闪的水花。

sentences.english: Stream water is urgent, spit when clouds of fresh leaf.
sentences.chinese: 流处水花急，吐时云叶鲜。

definition: spray/ocean spray/spindrift/fig. happenings from one's life/CL:朵[duo3]
stream of water (as from a fountain or a faucet)/jet of water
(of droplets, sparks etc) to fly about in all directions/to splatter everywhere
